summary: Comprehensive testing of Ascend gamified productivity app completed. All core features working correctly including welcome flow, quest systems, XP/level progression, mini-games, data persistence, and mobile responsiveness. Only issue found is settings modal accessibility due to modal overlay blocking interactions.

ui_bugs.issue: Settings button click intercepted by modal overlay, preventing access to settings and reset functionality

accessibility_issues.issue: Multiple accessibility warnings about missing DialogTitle and Description for screen readers
accessibility_issues.console_errors: DialogContent requires DialogTitle for accessibility, Missing Description or aria-describedby

passed_tests: Welcome modal flow for first-time users
Stats Card displays Level, XP progress bar, and Coins correctly
Main Quest creation, editing, objective toggling, progress tracking
Daily Quests add, complete, delete, streak tracking, XP rewards (+5 XP default)
Weekly Quests add, increment progress, streak tracking, XP rewards (+5 XP per increment)
Side Quests add, complete (auto-removal), delete, XP rewards (+5 XP default)
Mini-Games modal with all 4 games (Dice, Focus Hunt, Race Clock, Boss Battle)
Mini-Games expandable instructions and coin reward claiming (+5-10 coins)
XP gain animations and toast notifications working
Data persistence via localStorage across page refreshes
Streak tracking for daily (1-day streak) and weekly (0-week streak) quests
Glass UI styling with dark mode and proper color scheme
Mobile responsive design - all elements accessible on 390x844 viewport
Toast notifications for quest completion and XP gains
Confirmation modals for all critical actions (quest completion, deletion)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix settings modal overlay issue preventing access to settings and reset functionality. The modal backdrop is intercepting pointer events. Also consider adding DialogTitle and aria-describedby attributes to modal components for better accessibility.
